name: adidas Yeezy Slide Slate Marine
description:
The adidas Yeezy Slide in Slate Marine showcases an unprecedented combination of style and comfort. The slate marine colorway released on August 11, 2023. A deviation from the norm, this slide presents a sculpted yet sleek design, dominated by a bold, Slate Marine hue.

This slide comes dressed in a captivating Slate Marine color scheme. The minimalistic approach creates a modern silhouette that's both trendy and comfortable. The slides feature a characteristic adidas marking on the footbed, as well as the Yeezy imprint subtly incorporated, adding a splash of exclusivity to your step.

What we love about the Yeezy Slide design is the cloud-like cushioning that effortlessly molds to your foot, offering an unparalleled comfort experience. This cool slide effortlessly blends comfort with chic aesthetics. The adidas Yeezy Slide in Slate Marine was launched on August 11, 2023, retailing at a cool $70.
